'''Marvel Spider-Man Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140702072619/http://playxbla.com/minecraft-marvel-spider-man-skin-pack-now-available/|title=Minecraft Marvel Spider-Man Skin Pack: Now Available|website=playxbla.com|date=April 30, 2014|author=USN Saint}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] containing 35 skins of characters from the ''{{Wikipedia|Spider-Man}}'' superhero franchise by {{Wikipedia|Marvel Entertainment}} and was available on [[Legacy Console Edition]]s for Xbox consoles until December 21, 2015. Due to the [[Better Together Update]], it was added {{in|be}} on September 12, 2017, although it is only available to players who owned it already when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|September 21, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref>
